players.name: Lionel Messi
players.career_summary: Considered one of the greatest players of all time, Messi has won numerous awards including multiple Ballon de Oro trophies.

quotes.quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
I'm not out there to win a popularity contest. I'm out there to play football.

players.name: Cristiano Ronaldo
players.career_summary: One of the most prolific goalscorers in football history, known for his dedication and work ethic.

quotes.quote: Your love makes me strong. Your hate makes me unstoppable.
Talent without working hard is nothing.

players.name: Kylian Mbapp√©
players.career_summary: Rising superstar known for his exceptional speed and technical abilities.

quotes.quote: I always believed in myself and what I do, but when legends speak of you positively, it means a lot.
Dream big, it costs the same as dreaming small.

players.name: Erling Haaland
players.career_summary: Powerful striker with an incredible goal-scoring record at a young age.

quotes.quote: I just focus on having a good career and keeping myself happy.
I try not to think too much. I just want to prepare well and work hard.

players.name: Jude Bellingham
players.career_summary: Young midfielder who quickly established himself as one of the top talents in world football.

quotes.quote: I want to win everything and try to push my own boundaries. I don't think there is a limit.
It's about making the right decision in the right moment. As a midfield player, I've always said, it's not scoring goals, it's about doing the right thing at the right time.
